descriptor.name: Holiday Sale 2024
descriptor.short_desc: Save up to $200 on select smartphones and laptops
descriptor.long_desc: Limited time holiday sale with massive discounts on premium electronics. Get the latest iPhone 15 Pro, MacBook Air, and more at unbeatable prices. Offer valid until December 31, 2024.

descriptor.name: Trade-In Bonus
descriptor.short_desc: Get extra $100 trade-in bonus on smartphones
descriptor.long_desc: Trade in your old smartphone and get an additional $100 bonus on top of your trade-in value. Valid for iPhone, Samsung, and Google Pixel devices.

descriptor.name: My Best Buy Loyalty Program
descriptor.short_desc: Earn points on every purchase and get exclusive member benefits
descriptor.long_desc: Join My Best Buy loyalty program to earn points on every purchase, get exclusive member-only deals, early access to sales, and special financing options. Free to join with no annual fees.

descriptor.name: iPhone 15 Pro 128GB
descriptor.long_desc: Latest iPhone with A17 Pro chip, 48MP camera, and titanium design

descriptor.name: MacBook Air M2 13-inch
descriptor.long_desc: Apple MacBook Air with M2 chip featuring 8-core CPU and 10-core GPU, 8GB unified memory, and 256GB SSD storage. This ultra-thin laptop offers up to 18 hours of battery life, Liquid Retina display, and fanless design. Perfect for students, professionals, and everyday computing tasks.

descriptor.name: Samsung 65" QLED 4K TV
descriptor.long_desc: Samsung 65-inch QLED 4K Smart TV with Quantum Dot technology, delivering brilliant colors and deep blacks. Features HDR10+, Object Tracking Sound, and built-in Alexa. This smart TV includes multiple streaming apps and voice control capabilities for an immersive home entertainment experience.

descriptor.name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
descriptor.long_desc: Sony WH-1000XM5 wireless noise-canceling headphones with industry-leading noise cancellation technology. Features 30-hour battery life, quick charge capability, and premium comfort with soft fit leather. Perfect for travelers, commuters, and music enthusiasts who demand superior sound quality.

descriptor.name: PlayStation 5 Console
descriptor.long_desc: Sony PlayStation 5 gaming console with lightning-fast loading times, haptic feedback, and 3D audio technology. Includes DualSense wireless controller and supports 4K gaming with ray tracing. Perfect for gamers who want the ultimate next-generation gaming experience with stunning graphics and immersive gameplay.

descriptor.name: iPhone 15 128GB
descriptor.long_desc: Apple iPhone 15 with A16 Bionic chip, 48MP main camera, and Dynamic Island. Features USB-C connectivity, all-day battery life, and iOS 17. Perfect for everyday users who want the latest iPhone features with excellent camera performance and seamless integration.

descriptor.name: Samsung Galaxy S23
descriptor.long_desc: Samsung Galaxy S23 with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 50MP main camera, and 8GB RAM. Features 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 25W fast charging, and IP68 water resistance. Perfect for users who want flagship performance in a compact form factor.

descriptor.name: Google Pixel 7a
descriptor.long_desc: Google Pixel 7a with Google Tensor G2 chip, 64MP main camera, and 8GB RAM. Features 6.1-inch OLED display, 18W fast charging, and pure Android experience. Perfect for photography enthusiasts who want AI-powered camera features and clean software.

descriptor.name: MacBook Pro 14-inch M3
descriptor.long_desc: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch with M3 chip featuring 8-core CPU and 10-core GPU, 8GB unified memory, and 512GB SSD storage. Features Liquid Retina XDR display, up to 22 hours battery life, and advanced thermal system. Perfect for creative professionals and power users.

descriptor.name: Dell XPS 15 Laptop
descriptor.long_desc: Dell XPS 15 with Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD storage. Features 15.6-inch 4K OLED display, NVIDIA RTX 4050 graphics, and InfinityEdge design. Perfect for content creators and professionals who need powerful performance and stunning visuals.

descriptor.name: HP Spectre x360 2-in-1
descriptor.long_desc: HP Spectre x360 2-in-1 laptop with Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD storage. Features 13.5-inch 3K2K OLED touch display, 360-degree hinge, and all-day battery life. Perfect for professionals who need versatility and premium design.

descriptor.name: LG 65" OLED C3 Series
descriptor.long_desc: LG 65-inch OLED C3 Series 4K Smart TV with perfect blacks and infinite contrast. Features webOS smart platform, AI ThinQ, and Dolby Vision. This premium TV delivers stunning picture quality with self-lit pixels and advanced gaming features.

descriptor.name: Sony Bravia 75" X90K
descriptor.long_desc: Sony Bravia 75-inch X90K 4K LED Smart TV with Cognitive Processor XR and Full Array LED backlight. Features Google TV, Dolby Vision, and Object-based HDR remaster. Perfect for movie enthusiasts who want exceptional picture quality and smart features.

descriptor.name: Bose QuietComfort 45
descriptor.long_desc: Bose QuietComfort 45 wireless noise-canceling headphones with Acoustic Noise Canceling technology. Features 24-hour battery life, quick charge capability, and premium comfort. Perfect for travelers and commuters who demand superior noise cancellation.

descriptor.name: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Gen
descriptor.long_desc: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd generation with Active Noise Cancellation and Spatial Audio. Features H2 chip, up to 6 hours listening time, and MagSafe charging case. Perfect for iPhone users who want seamless integration and premium audio experience.

descriptor.name: Xbox Series X
descriptor.long_desc: Microsoft Xbox Series X gaming console with 12 teraflops of processing power and 4K gaming at up to 120 FPS. Features 1TB custom SSD, ray tracing, and backward compatibility. Perfect for gamers who want the most powerful Xbox experience.

descriptor.name: Nintendo Switch Lite
descriptor.long_desc: Nintendo Switch Lite handheld gaming console with 5.5-inch touchscreen and integrated controls. Features 32GB internal storage, all-day battery life, and compact design. Perfect for portable gaming enthusiasts who want a dedicated handheld experience.

descriptor.name: iPhone 14 128GB
descriptor.long_desc: Apple iPhone 14 with A15 Bionic chip, 12MP dual camera system, and 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display. Features all-day battery life, Ceramic Shield, and iOS 16. Perfect for users who want reliable performance and excellent camera quality.

descriptor.name: Samsung Galaxy A54 5G
descriptor.long_desc: Samsung Galaxy A54 5G with Exynos 1380 processor, 50MP main camera, and 6.4-inch Super AMOLED display. Features 25W fast charging, IP67 water resistance, and 5G connectivity. Perfect for budget-conscious users who want premium features.

descriptor.name: MacBook Air 15-inch M2
descriptor.long_desc: Apple MacBook Air 15-inch with M2 chip featuring 8-core CPU and 10-core GPU, 8GB unified memory, and 256GB SSD storage. Features Liquid Retina display, up to 18 hours battery life, and fanless design. Perfect for students and professionals.

descriptor.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
descriptor.long_desc: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon with Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD storage. Features 14-inch 2.2K display, fingerprint reader, and military-grade durability. Perfect for business professionals who need reliability and security.

descriptor.name: Samsung 75" QLED Q80C
descriptor.long_desc: Samsung 75-inch QLED Q80C 4K Smart TV with Quantum Dot technology and Direct Full Array backlight. Features Object Tracking Sound, HDR10+, and built-in Alexa. Perfect for home theater enthusiasts who want immersive audio and stunning visuals.

descriptor.name: TCL 65" 6-Series 4K TV
descriptor.long_desc: TCL 65-inch 6-Series 4K Smart TV with Mini-LED technology and QLED color. Features Roku TV, Dolby Vision, and 120Hz refresh rate. Perfect for budget-conscious buyers who want premium picture quality and smart features.

descriptor.name: JBL Charge 5 Portable Speaker
descriptor.long_desc: JBL Charge 5 portable Bluetooth speaker with 20 hours of playtime and IP67 waterproof rating. Features dual passive radiators for powerful bass and PartyBoost for connecting multiple speakers. Perfect for outdoor activities and parties.

descriptor.name: Beats Studio Pro
descriptor.long_desc: Beats Studio Pro wireless headphones with Active Noise Cancellation and Spatial Audio. Features 40-hour battery life, Apple H1 chip, and premium comfort. Perfect for music lovers who want immersive sound and seamless Apple integration.

descriptor.name: Steam Deck
descriptor.long_desc: Valve Steam Deck handheld gaming PC with AMD APU, 7-inch touchscreen, and 64GB storage. Features SteamOS, customizable controls, and portable gaming library. Perfect for PC gamers who want to take their Steam library on the go.

descriptor.name: Xbox Series S
descriptor.long_desc: Microsoft Xbox Series S all-digital gaming console with 512GB SSD and 1440p gaming at up to 120 FPS. Features ray tracing, backward compatibility, and Game Pass integration. Perfect for gamers who want next-gen performance in a compact design.

descriptor.name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
descriptor.long_desc: Canon EOS R6 Mark II mirrorless camera with 24.2MP full-frame sensor and 4K video recording. Features Dual Pixel CMOS AF II, 40 FPS continuous shooting, and 5-axis image stabilization. Perfect for professional photographers and videographers.

descriptor.name: Sony Alpha A7 IV
descriptor.long_desc: Sony Alpha A7 IV full-frame mirrorless camera with 33MP sensor and 4K 60p video. Features Real-time Eye AF, 10 FPS continuous shooting, and 5-axis stabilization. Perfect for hybrid shooters who need both photo and video capabilities.

descriptor.name: DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone
descriptor.long_desc: DJI Mini 3 Pro lightweight drone with 4K camera and 34-minute flight time. Features obstacle avoidance, 4K/60fps video, and weighs under 250g. Perfect for aerial photography and videography enthusiasts.

descriptor.name: Samsung Bespoke 4-Door Flex Refrigerator
descriptor.long_desc: Samsung Bespoke 4-Door Flex refrigerator with customizable panels and Family Hub touchscreen. Features FlexZone drawer, Twin Cooling Plus, and 25.5 cu ft capacity. Perfect for modern kitchens with smart connectivity.

descriptor.name: LG Front Load Washer & Dryer Set
descriptor.long_desc: LG 4.5 cu ft front load washer and 7.4 cu ft dryer with Steam technology. Features TurboWash 360, AI Direct Drive, and ThinQ smart connectivity. Perfect for efficient laundry with smart features.

descriptor.name: Apple Watch Ultra 2
descriptor.long_desc: Apple Watch Ultra 2 with S9 chip, 49mm titanium case, and Action Button. Features dual-frequency GPS, 36-hour battery life, and cellular connectivity. Perfect for athletes and outdoor enthusiasts.

descriptor.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic
descriptor.long_desc: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic with rotating bezel, 44mm stainless steel case, and Wear OS. Features advanced health monitoring, 5ATM water resistance, and 40-hour battery life. Perfect for Android users.

descriptor.name: Google Nest Cam (Battery)
descriptor.long_desc: Google Nest Cam with battery-powered design and 1080p HD video. Features 3-hour event history, person detection, and weather-resistant design. Perfect for home security and monitoring.

descriptor.name: Philips Hue White & Color Starter Kit
descriptor.long_desc: Philips Hue White & Color starter kit with 4 A19 bulbs and Hue Bridge. Features 16 million colors, voice control, and smart scheduling. Perfect for creating smart lighting throughout your home.

descriptor.name: Logitech MX Master 3S Mouse
descriptor.long_desc: Logitech MX Master 3S wireless mouse with 8000 DPI sensor and silent clicks. Features MagSpeed scroll wheel, multi-device connectivity, and 70-day battery life. Perfect for productivity and creative work.

descriptor.name: Samsung T7 Shield Portable SSD
descriptor.long_desc: Samsung T7 Shield portable SSD with 1TB capacity and USB 3.2 Gen 2. Features IP65 water resistance, drop resistance up to 3m, and read speeds up to 1,050 MB/s. Perfect for secure data storage on the go.

descriptor.name: iPhone 13 128GB
descriptor.long_desc: Apple iPhone 13 with A15 Bionic chip, 12MP dual camera system, and 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display. Features all-day battery life, Ceramic Shield, and iOS 15. Perfect for users who want reliable performance and excellent value.

descriptor.name: OnePlus 11

descriptor.name: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless

descriptor.name: Meta Quest 3 VR Headset

descriptor.name: Sony A7R V Mirrorless Camera
descriptor.long_desc: Sony A7R V with 61MP full-frame sensor and AI-powered autofocus. Features 8K video, 5-axis stabilization, and dual card slots. Perfect for high-resolution photography and professional work.

descriptor.name: Bosch 800 Series Dishwasher
descriptor.long_desc: Bosch 800 Series built-in dishwasher with CrystalDry technology and 44 dBA noise level. Features 16 place settings, 3rd rack, and AquaStop leak protection. Perfect for quiet, efficient dishwashing.

descriptor.name: Wolf 30" Dual Fuel Range
descriptor.long_desc: Wolf 30-inch dual fuel range with 6 burners and convection oven. Features sealed burners, continuous grates, and premium stainless steel construction. Perfect for serious home chefs.

descriptor.name: Garmin Fenix 7X Sapphire Solar
descriptor.long_desc: Garmin Fenix 7X Sapphire Solar with solar charging and 51mm display. Features multi-GNSS support, topographic maps, and 28-day battery life. Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts and athletes.

descriptor.name: Fitbit Sense 2
descriptor.long_desc: Fitbit Sense 2 with ECG monitoring and stress management tools. Features 6+ day battery life, GPS, and advanced health metrics. Perfect for health-conscious users.

descriptor.name: Philips Hue Bridge
descriptor.long_desc: Philips Hue Bridge with support for up to 50 lights and accessories. Features Apple HomeKit, Google Assistant, and Amazon Alexa integration. Perfect for smart home lighting control.

descriptor.name: Ecobee Smart Thermostat Premium
descriptor.long_desc: Ecobee Smart Thermostat Premium with built-in Alexa and air quality monitoring. Features occupancy detection, weather integration, and energy reports. Perfect for smart home climate control.

descriptor.name: Logitech MX Keys Mini
descriptor.long_desc: Logitech MX Keys Mini wireless keyboard with low-profile scissor switches and backlighting. Features multi-device connectivity, smart backlighting, and compact design. Perfect for productivity and travel.

descriptor.name: Samsung 970 EVO Plus 2TB NVMe SSD
descriptor.long_desc: Samsung 970 EVO Plus 2TB NVMe SSD with read speeds up to 3,500 MB/s and write speeds up to 3,300 MB/s. Features V-NAND technology and 5-year warranty. Perfect for high-performance storage.
